components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Inbound Call Failures to a Subset of Twilio Argentina Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to observe a subset of call failures to Twilio Argentina phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to observe a subset of call failures to Twilio Argentina phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to observe a subset of call failures to Twilio Argentina phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing a subset of call failures to Twilio Argentina phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 January 2023 at 14:00 PST until 24 January 2023 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance to Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 January 2023 at 01:00 PST until 25 January 2023 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from the following countries below via a subset of longcodes.

Belgium
Guam
Cuba
Austria

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 25 January 2023 at 10:00 PST until 25 January 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

The Yota network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 25 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 25 January 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Yota Russia handsets.

The Megafon network in Russia is conducting an emergency  maintenance from 25 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 25 January 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Megafon Russia handsets.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 January 2023 at 14:00 PST until 25 January 2023 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

The Telcel network in Mexico is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 January 2023 at 19:50 PST until 25 January 2023 at 20:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Telcel Mexico handsets.

The Telcel network in Mexico is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 January 2023 at 20:50 PST until 25 January 2023 at 21:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Telcel Mexico handsets.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 January 2023 at 10:00 PST until 26 January 2023 at 13:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

The Vodafone network in Egypt is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 January 2023 at 15:00 PST until 26 January 2023 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Vodafone Egypt handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 January 2023 at 08:00 PST until 28 January 2023 at 14:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and call failures for calls to a subset of Twilio Singapore phone numbers.

Our SMS/MMS carrier partner in US is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 January 2023 at 22:00 PST until 29 January 2023 at 05:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS/MMS to and from US handsets via a subset of US Longcode and US Shortcode.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 January 2023 at 16:00 PST until 30 January 2023 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call drops to a subset of Twilio Germany and Austria phone numbers.

The C-Spire network in USA is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 January 2023 at 22:00 PST until 31 January 2023 at 02:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from C-Spire handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 January 2023 at 22:30 PST until 30 January 2023 at 23:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS from US handsets to a subset of US shortcodes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 February 2023 at 14:30 PST until 01 February 2023 at 15:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 February 2023 at 16:00 PST until 01 February 2023 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call drops to a subset of Twilio Germany and Austria phone numbers

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Arab Emirates SMS Carrier Maintenance - Etisalat

incident_updates.body: The Etisalat network in United Arab Emirates is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 02 February 2023 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Etisalat United Arab Emirates handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 30 January 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

09 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 09 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
11 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 11 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
16 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 16 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
18 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 18 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
23 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 23 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
25 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 25 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
30 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 30 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
